0.2.2 release notes
Bug fix for crash #9. Delete async task must be created on the UI thread.

Broad fix for SecurityException when deleting emails. On Android 4.3, by default exported=false for providers instead of true before. Only recent version of K-9 Mail have it

See
. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/18847302/securityexception-permission-denial-opening-provider
. https://github.com/k9mail/k-9/commit/06ae2a071b80b063ae4eafb635d6f8df728d4d6d
